gobblin.util.io

Class GsonInterfaceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.io.GsonInterfaceAdapter
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The interface or abstract type to be serialized and deserialized with Gson.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory

    public class GsonInterfaceAdapter
extends Object
implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
    A Gson interface adapter that makes it possible to serialize and deserialize polymorphic objects.

    This adapter will capture all instances of baseClass and write them as {"object-type":"class.name", "object-data":"data"}, allowing for correct serialization and deserialization of polymorphic objects. The following types will not be captured by the adapter (i.e. they will be written by the default GSON writer): - Primitives and boxed primitives - Arrays - Collections - Maps Additionally, generic classes (e.g. class MyClass) cannot be correctly decoded.

    To use: 

              
            MyClass object = new MyClass();
            Gson gson = GsonInterfaceAdapter.getGson(MyBaseClass.class);
            String json = gson.toJson(object);
            Myclass object2 = gson.fromJson(json, MyClass.class);

    Note: a useful case is GsonInterfaceAdapter.getGson(Object.class), which will correctly serialize / deserialize all types except for java generics.
